name: xinput

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: xinput is a utility to configure and test XInput devices.

dependencies.name: fixesproto
dependencies.description:
X Fixes Extension. The extension makes changes to many areas of the
protocol to resolve issues raised by application interaction with core
protocol mechanisms that cannot be adequately worked around on the
client side of the wire.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: inputproto
dependencies.description:
X Input Extension. This extension defines a protocol to provide
additional input devices management such as graphic tablets.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxi
dependencies.description: libXi - library for the X Input Extension.

dependencies.name: libxinerama
dependencies.description: libXinerama - API for Xinerama extension to X11 Protocol.

dependencies.name: libxrandr
dependencies.description: libXrandr - X Resize, Rotate and Reflection extension library.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: randrproto
dependencies.description:
X Resize and Rotate Extension (RandR). This extension defines a protocol
for clients to dynamically change X screens, so as to resize, rotate and
reflect the root window of a screen.

dependencies.name: util-macros
dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.

dependencies.name: xineramaproto
dependencies.description:
X Xinerama Extension. This is an X extension that allows multiple
physical screens controlled by a single X server to appear as a single
screen.
